title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5402.7 - Disclosure of information related to persons on the self-exclusion list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5402.7 - Disclosure of information related to persons on the self-exclusion list

State Regulations
(a) Information
furnished to or obtained by the commission pursuant to this Part shall be
deemed confidential and shall not be disclosed unless necessary to implement
this Part or other law or as may be required by a validly issued court
order. (b) The commission may
release periodically to the public demographics and general information in
regard to the self-exclusion list, such as the total number of persons on the
list, gender breakdown and age range. (c) The commission may make selected data
available, upon request, for the limited purpose of assisting in the proper
administration of problem gambling treatment or responsible gaming
programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5402.7

Amended

New

York State Register April 10, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 15, eff. 4/10/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
